channel.title: Posts on The Fundamentalist Historian
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Fundamentalist Historian

item.title: Computational Methods Update, March 15
item.description: March 15: I tooled around with the Wikidata Query Service, looking through Churches of Christ-related search terms, and was surprised to find only three “instances of” a magazine with the “main subject” of Churches of Christ.

item.title: Comp Methods Progress, March 9
item.description: March 9: For my topic modeling, I chose 12 editorials from the 1960 volume of the Firm Foundation ending on Nov.
